function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Transmission of virus from infected individuals to the community due to quarantine facility leakage","Impact":"Enormously costly consequences, prolonged lockdowns, and temporary phase-out of quarantine facilities","Mitigation":"Improved infrastructure and building operations solutions, vaccination of quarantine facility workers","Technologies":"Advanced ventilation systems, air purification technologies","People":"Community members, government, quarantine facility workers","Owner":"Government, building operators"},{"Description":"Poor understanding of SARS-CoV-2 transmission mechanisms leading to errors in quarantine site selection and controls","Impact":"Transmission in hotel-managed quarantines, erroneous focus on fomite-based controls","Mitigation":"Enhanced education on virus transmission mechanisms, improved quarantine site selection criteria","Technologies":"Data-driven risk assessment tools, training programs for quarantine facility staff","People":"Government, quarantine facility operators, healthcare professionals","Owner":"Health organizations, government"},{"Description":"Inadequate indoor infection control in constructed environments leading to high transmission rates of respiratory viruses","Impact":"95.7% of super spreader events occurring indoors, increased risk of virus transmission in existing buildings","Mitigation":"Enhanced indoor ventilation systems, implementation of infection control protocols","Technologies":"HVAC systems with high-efficiency air filters, indoor air quality monitoring devices","People":"Building occupants, facility managers, public health authorities","Owner":"Facility management companies, public health authorities"}]}
